Which platform has the best ROAS?:
SELECT 
    Platform,
    SUM(Revenue_2024) / NULLIF(SUM("Total Spent"), 0) AS ROAS
FROM 
    all_campaigns
GROUP BY 
    Platform
ORDER BY 
    ROAS DESC
LIMIT 1;
which platform has best performance:
SELECT 
    Platform,
    SUM("Total Spent") AS Total_Spend,
    SUM(Impressions) AS Total_Impressions,
    SUM(Clicks) AS Total_Clicks,
    SUM("Site Visit") AS Total_Conversions,
    ROUND((SUM(Clicks) / NULLIF(SUM(Impressions), 0)) * 100, 2) AS CTR,
    ROUND(SUM("Total Spent") / NULLIF(SUM(Clicks), 0), 2) AS CPC,
    ROUND((SUM("Total Spent") / NULLIF(SUM(Impressions), 0)) * 1000, 2) AS CPM,
    ROUND(SUM("Total Spent") / NULLIF(SUM("Site Visit"), 0), 2) AS CPA,
    ROUND((SUM("Site Visit") / NULLIF(SUM(Clicks), 0)) * 100, 2) AS Conversion_Rate,
    ROUND(SUM(Revenue_2024) / NULLIF(SUM("Total Spent"), 0), 2) AS ROAS
FROM 
    all_campaigns
GROUP BY 
    Platform
ORDER BY 
    ROAS DESC
LIMIT 1;
which platforms has best performance:
SELECT 
    Platform,
    SUM("Total Spent") AS Total_Spend,
    SUM(Impressions) AS Total_Impressions,
    SUM(Clicks) AS Total_Clicks,
    SUM("Site Visit") AS Total_Conversions,
    ROUND((SUM(Clicks) / NULLIF(SUM(Impressions), 0)) * 100, 2) AS CTR,
    ROUND(SUM("Total Spent") / NULLIF(SUM(Clicks), 0), 2) AS CPC,
    ROUND((SUM("Total Spent") / NULLIF(SUM(Impressions), 0)) * 1000, 2) AS CPM,
    ROUND(SUM("Total Spent") / NULLIF(SUM("Site Visit"), 0), 2) AS CPA,
    ROUND((SUM("Site Visit") / NULLIF(SUM(Clicks), 0)) * 100, 2) AS Conversion_Rate,
    ROUND(SUM(Revenue_2024) / NULLIF(SUM("Total Spent"), 0), 2) AS ROAS
FROM 
    all_campaigns
GROUP BY 
    Platform
ORDER BY 
    ROAS DESC
LIMIT 10;

    ROUND(SUM(ROAS), 2) AS ROAS
FROM 
    all_campaigns

    Campaign, Platform
ORDER BY

test:
SELECT 
    Campaign, 
    Platform, 
    SUM(Spend) AS Total_Spend, 
    SUM(Impressions) AS Total_Impressions, 
    SUM(Clicks) AS Total_Clicks, 
    SUM(Conversions) AS Total_Conversions, 
    ROUND((SUM(Clicks) / NULLIF(SUM(Impressions), 0)) * 100, 2) AS CTR, 
    ROUND(SUM(Spend) / NULLIF(SUM(Clicks), 0), 2) AS CPC, 
    ROUND(SUM(Spend) / NULLIF(SUM(Conversions), 0), 2) AS CPA, 
    ROUND(SUM(Conversions) / NULLIF(SUM(Clicks), 0) * 100, 2) AS Conversion_Rate, 
    ROUND(SUM(ROAS), 2) AS ROAS
FROM 
    all_campaigns
GROUP BY 
    Campaign, Platform
ORDER BY 
    ROAS DESC
LIMIT 10;
Analyze all campaigns in extreme detail:
WITH campaign_metrics AS (
    SELECT 
        Campaign,
        Platform,
        SUM(Spend) AS total_spend,
        SUM(Impressions) AS total_impressions,
        SUM(Clicks) AS total_clicks,
        SUM(Conversions) AS total_conversions,
        ROUND((SUM(Clicks) / NULLIF(SUM(Impressions), 0)) * 100, 2) AS "CTR",
        ROUND(SUM(Spend) / NULLIF(SUM(Clicks), 0), 2) AS "CPC",
        ROUND((SUM(Spend) / NULLIF(SUM(Impressions), 0)) * 1000, 2) AS cpm,
        ROUND(SUM(Spend) / NULLIF(SUM(Conversions), 0), 2) AS "CPA",
        ROUND(SUM(ROAS), 2) AS roas,
        ROUND((SUM(Conversions) / NULLIF(SUM(Clicks), 0)) * 100, 2) AS conversion_rate
    FROM all_campaigns
    GROUP BY Campaign, Platform
)
SELECT 
    Campaign,
    Platform,
    total_spend,
    total_impressions,
    total_clicks,
    total_conversions,
    "CTR",
    "CPC",
    cpm,
    "CPA",
    roas,
    conversion_rate
FROM campaign_metrics
ORDER BY roas DESC, conversion_rate DESC, total_conversions DESC
LIMIT 10;
